title: Deakin's pipe dream

abstract: Mildura - A vision of Federation and irrigation in Sunraysia
description: A montage of archival photographic images superimposed with live action footage to present a vision of Federation and irrigation in the Sunraysia region of Victoria. Without dialogue and accompanied only by background sound effects. Developed during the Alfred Deakin Federation Project, 2001 and supported by the Centenary of Federation Victoria and the Community Support Fund through the Victorian Federation Grants Scheme, and the Mildura City Council.
